title: What are some piano practice techniques used by Schubert? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am pretty sure nobody knows much about how Chopin, Mozart, or Schubert practiced. (I’m surprised you omitted Beethoven. )The best one could do is to research the piano pedagogy texts that they might have encountered. However, it’s an intriguing question. How did Mozart’s pianistic style, with it’s characteristic flowing melodies against arpeggiated harmony, evolve into Schubert’s use of octaves and big block harmonies, a technique closer to ragtime than it is to Mozart? Was it the evolution of the instrument? Was it that Schubert had much bigger hands? Did Schubert learn that technique from someone else? Your questions could be the basis of a substantial research project.
